titleStmt.title: Look unto Jesus, or, An ascent to the Holy Mount to see Jesus Christ in his glory whereby the active and contemplative believer may have the eyes of his understanding more inlightned to behold in some measure the eternity and immutability of the Lord Jesus Christ ... : at the end of the book is an appendix, shewing the certainty of the calling of the Jews / written by Edward Lane.
titleStmt.author: Lane, Edward, 1605-1685.

titleStmt.title: Look unto Jesus, or, An ascent to the Holy Mount to see Jesus Christ in his glory whereby the active and contemplative believer may have the eyes of his understanding more inlightned to behold in some measure the eternity and immutability of the Lord Jesus Christ ... : at the end of the book is an appendix, shewing the certainty of the calling of the Jews / written by Edward Lane.
titleStmt.author: Lane, Edward, 1605-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Roycroft for the Authour, and are to be sold by Humphrey Tuckey, and by William Taylor,
